requirements.description: The Parties agree to comply with all applicable privacy laws
Licensee is responsible for obtaining all applicable consents required to enable OneSignal to collect information from End User's device or browser
Licensee shall publish privacy policies and disclosures for the Properties that comply with applicable law and the terms of this EULA
The privacy policies must include clear disclosures that the SDK Information will be collected and how it may be used, as set forth in Section 5

type.summary: Disclosure of SDK Information Collection and Usage
